channel.title: Government, Public Administration & Municipalities on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS
channel.description: Recent content in Government, Public Administration & Municipalities on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS

item.title: QField for Cadastral and Land Registry
item.description:
Cadastral fieldwork

  • Boundary verification and evidence collection
  • Parcel attribute checks and updates
  • Photo documentation and audit trail

Works with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Design forms in QGIS and sync via QFieldCloud to keep registry data accurate and traceable.

item.title: QField for Cultural Heritage and Archaeology
item.description:
What you can do

  • Heritage inventories and condition surveys
  • Excavation context and finds recording
  • Monitoring and conservation activities

Integrated with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Prepare layers and forms in QGIS and sync via QFieldCloud to collaborate across teams.

item.title: QField for Government and Municipalities
item.description:
Fieldwork for public administration

Inventory public assets, record inspections, and manage service requests with a user-friendly mobile GIS.

Typical workflows

  • Street furniture and lighting inventories
  • Parks, trails, and facilities inspections
  • Citizen issue documentation and resolution tracking

Integrates with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Prepare layers, forms, and symbology in QGIS. Keep teams in sync and on record using QFieldCloud.

item.title: QField for Public Works and Infrastructure Maintenance
item.description:
Field workflows

  • Asset inventory and condition assessment
  • Maintenance inspections and repairs
  • Work order documentation and QA

Works with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Build your data model in QGIS and collaborate via QFieldCloud to keep records current.

item.title: QField for Smart Cities and Urban Mobility
item.description:
What you can do

  • Sensor and device inventories
  • Mobility infrastructure mapping
  • Condition and performance checks

Integrated with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Ensure teams use the same data and styles, with sync and review workflows built in.

item.title: QField for Tourism and Outdoor Recreation Management
item.description:
Field workflows

  • Trail mapping and signage
  • Facility inventories and inspections

Works with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Prepare projects in QGIS and keep teams aligned with QFieldCloud collaboration.

item.title: QField for Urban Planning and Zoning
item.description:
What you can do

  • Site surveys and plan monitoring

Integrated with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Keep planners and inspectors aligned with a single source of truth, online or offline.

item.title: QField for Waste Management and Sanitation
item.description:
Field workflows

Works with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Build your model in QGIS and collaborate via QFieldCloud to keep operations smooth.
